name: a portrait of feathers
description:
a portrait of feathers is a bite-sized visual novel about an angel and someone they've watched over. it was created within a week for O2A2 2022 game jam! i cut it pretty close to the deadline but I hope you can enjoy it anyway!

warning: 

this game contains themes that may not be suitable for everyone such as text based descriptions of violence/injuries, unhealthy relationships, and mentions of religion/vague allusions to a cult. please keep that in mind before you play!

features:

🕇998 words
🕇2 endings
🕇1 sprite
🕇1 background
🕇1 song
